channel.title: Non-profit Moparscape Server + Jagex?
channel.description:
Yeah yeah, the troll question everybody hates but this is no trolls.
I am wondering, if Jagex has the right to bring anyone to court for hosting a Moparscape server that takes zero donations from any players and make it completely free to play to the point where zero money is being profited. That includes no advertisements, no donations, no real world or real Runescape trading of any kind and no paid staff.
I do know that Jagex has the right to close the server down, but I'm wondering if they can take anyone to court if they abide these laws. I'm reading the fair use copyright law of the USA and I'm debating whether or not Runescape is under that law, and whether or not the law applies to the rules I have stated.

item.title: Non-profit Moparscape Server + Jagex?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

they probably wouldn’t, but as stated above, they could.

Read full topic
